duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess and improve the existing team and key processes in the accounting department to enhance efficiency and compliance.
Implement technical accounting improvements, including revenue recognition under ASC 606 and optimization of other accounting processes.
Lead a high-performing global accounting team and take responsibility for day-to-day accounting operations.
Prepare detailed monthly financial reports and collaborate with the FP&A team for external reporting.
Serve as the company's expert on accounting matters, partnering with the CFO, FP&A team, and cross-functional leadership.
Collaborate with Treasury Manager and CFO to assist with cash management and forecasting, and oversee annual financial audits.
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements on a global basis and enforce adherence to filings; provide guidance on accounting/audit implications of business practices.
Optimize and administer Netsuite implementation, streamline workflows, and enforce internal controls; assist in implementing and automating critical accounting workflows/processes.

education_certification.credential: CPA certification; Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Business, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
